request.description: This POST endpoint is used to register a new user in the system. The request body must include the user's name, email, password, and role. The role defines the user's access level, such as admin or regular user. This endpoint validates the input and creates a new user account upon successful registration.

item.name: Fetch User Blog With Login Validation

request.description: This PUT request updates an existing user task identified by the task ID in the URL path. The endpoint expects a JSON body with 'title' and 'description' fields to modify the task's details. Use this request to change the title and description of a specific task by providing the task ID in the URL and the updated data in the request body.

response.name: 200 ok
